body_html: @nyxjemk I am sorry that it is really hard to identify the root cause because we do not have the virtual env like yours. LSTM mainly involves with BLAS which is usually accelerated by MKL or openBLAS. I just identified a severe bug #5047 of BLAS usage which results in bad performance on CPU in the recent version. Could you provide the commit id of the source? And I will try to reproduce your problem and identify the root cause.

body: @nyxjemk I am sorry that it is really hard to identify the root cause because we do not have the virtual env like yours.  LSTM mainly involves with BLAS which is usually accelerated by MKL or openBLAS. I just identified a severe bug #5047 of BLAS usage which results in bad performance on CPU in the recent version. Could you provide the commit id of the source?  And I will try to reproduce your problem and identify the root cause.
